Token.Abstract: The CCSprite being used. The sprite, by default, will use the following blending function: GLONE, GLONEMINUSSRC_ALPHA. The blending function can be changed in runtime by calling: - [[renderTexture sprite] setBlendFunc:(ccBlendFunc){GLONE, GLONEMINUSSRC_ALPHA}];

The CCSprite being used. The sprite, by default, will use the following blending function: GLONE, GLONEMINUSSRC_ALPHA. The blending function can be changed in runtime by calling: - [[renderTexture sprite] setBlendFunc:(ccBlendFunc){GLONE, GLONEMINUSSRC_ALPHA}];

The CCSprite being used. The sprite, by default, will use the following blending function: GLONE, GLONEMINUSSRC_ALPHA. The blending function can be changed in runtime by calling: - [[renderTexture sprite] setBlendFunc:(ccBlendFunc){GLONE, GLONEMINUSSRC_ALPHA}];
